summary: In the Dutch islands, the sister of a pious missionary attempts to reform a womanizing, drunken beach bum.
cast: Charles Laughton|Elsa Lanchester|Robert Newton|Tyrone Guthrie|Eliot Makeham|Dolly Mollinger|D.A. Ward|J. Solomon|S. Alley|Dudley|Mah Foo|Rosita Garcia|Fred Groves|Ley On
title: Bandera amarilla
